name: COUNCIL ON SOCIAL WORK EDUCATION
description: Association of individuals and undergrad and graduate professional social work programs
sampleDescriptions: Issues pertaining to the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) program.

Issues pertaining to the Behavioral Health Workforce Education and Training (BHWET) at HRSA.
P.L. 114-255, 21st Century Cures Act, Issues pertaining to implementation of mental health provisions in 21st Century Cures.
Issues pertaining to mental and behavioral health and the role of social work. 
Issues pertaining to addressing  social determinants of health.
Issues pertaining to support for social work and social work education to support healthcare in the United States.
Issues pertaining to addressing opioid epidemic.
H.R. 3728, Educating Medical Professionals and Optimizing Workforce Efficiency and Readiness Act of 2017 or EMPOWER Act, Issues pertaining to Title VII reauthorization for health profession programs, specifically geriatric, and mental and behavioral health programs. 
Issues pertaining to addressing the full needs of the individual, including psychosocial, at HHS, support for Integrated mental and behavioral healthcare.

H.R. 3358, S. 1771, FY 2018 Labor/HHS/Education Appropriations, Issues pertaining to funding for health professions training at HRSA, including the BHWET program and Scholarships for Disadvantaged Students; the Minority Fellowship Program at SAMHSA; student aid programs, Pell, GAANN at the Department of Education; and funding for NIH.
P.L. 115-141, Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2018, Issues pertaining to funding for health professions training including, Leadership in Public Health Social Work Education, Geriatrics Workforce Enhancement Program, the BHWET program, Scholarships for Disadvantaged students at HRSA; the Minority Fellowship Program at SAMHSA; student aid programs including Pell at the Department of Education; and funding for NIH.
FY 2019 Labor/HHS/Education Appropriations, Issues pertaining to protecting vulnerable and underserved populations and funding for health professions training including, Leadership in Public Health Social Work Education, Geriatrics Workforce Enhancement Program, the BHWET program, Scholarships for Disadvantaged students at HRSA; the Minority Fellowship Program at SAMHSA; support for student aid programs including Pell at the Department of Education; and funding for NIH.

Other issues pertaining to Public Service Loan Forgiveness.
